identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.emotional_goal: Calm Efficiency. The 'Flow State' of a Barista.

headings.usage: Use for all category titles, modal headers, and brand elements. Tight tracking.

body.usage: Use for menu descriptions, receipts, and tabular data. High legibility is key.

mono.usage: Use strictly for pricing, tax calculations, and the final receipt view.

layout_strategy.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 and p-8 for containers. Gap-4 for dense grids.

MenuCard.style: Flat card, no shadow, 1px border. Image height fixed 160px. Object-cover.
MenuCard.interaction: Scale 1.02 on hover. Add button visible on hover (desktop) or always (mobile).
MenuCard.typography: Title font-bold text-lg. Price font-mono text-md.

BillPanel.style: Looks like a physical receipt. White bg, drop-shadow-md. Zig-zag border bottom (optional svg).

CategoryFilter.style: Pill shaped tabs. Active = Primary Color. Inactive = Muted bg.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise on the main background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Sharp, non-diffused shadows for buttons to feel tactile.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided CSS variables to establish the 'Espresso & Crema' theme.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Install fonts (Manrope, Inter, JetBrains Mono) in index.html or import in CSS.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Build the layout using the 8/4 column split (Menu vs Bill).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Use the provided image URLs for the Login and Main Dashboard headers.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Ensure the Bill Panel uses a Monospace font to look like a real receipt.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Implement 'Sonner' for toast notifications (Order added, Bill printed).

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue'. Stick to the Earthy/Coffee palette.
Avoid gradients. Use flat colors with texture or subtle borders.
Micro-animations: Buttons should 'press' down (scale 0.95) on click.
Inputs: Use 'Shadcn Input' but style it with a 'border-b-2' only (underline style) for a cleaner look, or standard box with thick border.
All prices MUST use the Monospace font.
